net.sf.image4j.io

Class EndianUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.image4j.io.EndianUtils

  • public class EndianUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility methods for endian conversions [big-endian to little-endian; little-endian to big-endian].
    Author:
    Ian McDonagh
